head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GORTZ, NORMAN N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GORTZ, NORMAN N.

block.p: GORTZ--Norman N., of Boca Raton FL. Formerly of Great Neck on April 1, 2007. Loving and devoted husband of the late Doris, beloved father of Nancy and Gil Rose, Albert and Jane Gortz and David and Linda Gortz. Loving grandfather of Alison, Dorothy, Rebecca, Scott, Darren, Kelly and Katie and seven great-grandchildren. Memorial services April 5, 2007 at Temple Beth El Boca Raton FL. In lieu of flower donations may be made to Jewish Federation of South Palm Beach County, 9901 Donna K. Blvd Boca Raton, FL 33428.
